user_data.target_needs: I wanted to find a bra that provided both comfort and support, particularly for my specific body type and needs.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a bra that offered good support and comfort, especially given my specific body type. The full-frame construction and the promise of a no-bulge look were appealing. However, the fit was not ideal for me, as I found the band to be too tight and lacking in stretch, which ultimately made it uncomfortable. I relied on the product's features and my previous experiences with similar items to make my decision.

I needed a comfortable bra to wear at home that wouldn't irritate my back, but I also required adequate support due to my size. The description highlighted comfort and flexibility, which were important to me. However, I found that it did not provide the necessary support, leading me to realize that I should have prioritized underwire options. My decision was based on product details and my specific needs.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, quality, and good value for money. I appreciate items that are made from natural materials, such as cotton, and those that provide a soft and warm feel. I also value well-made accessories that are aesthetically pleasing and come in attractive packaging, making them suitable for gifting. Additionally, I tend to favor products that fit well and are true to size, as well as those that are durable and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike products that are misrepresented in terms of material, such as synthetic items being labeled as leather, and I have a strong aversion to items that do not fit properly or lack adequate support, especially in footwear and undergarments. Overall, I seek a balance of comfort, quality, and accurate product descriptions in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find a bra that offers both comfort and support, tailored to my specific body type and needs. within my expected price range: [18.99, 20.78]
What specific features or design elements are important to you in a bra to ensure it is tailored to your body type and needs?

I look for bras with a full-frame construction that promises a no-bulge look to cater to my specific needs. Comfort and support are essential, so I prioritize bras that offer adequate coverage and a secure fit. The material should be soft and gentle on the skin, ensuring a comfortable wearing experience throughout the day. Adjustable straps and a supportive band are also crucial for ensuring proper support and a personalized fit.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Pure Comfort Wireless Lace Longline Bralette, Lightly Lined Convertible Bra> / Item ID: B077Y5C59Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Versatility and comfort go hand-in-hand in this lace bralette from the Pure Comfort collection. Soft foam cups provide comfortable support. The beauty of this longline bralette is how its adjustable straps convert from traditional straight to halter to crisscross wear, so it works easily under all your clothes. The longline design has a plunging, scallop-edged neckline and a pretty lace front with cool mesh sides and back. For added support, its longline frame has side boning that helps hold you in place. And it comes in multiple sizes and colors, including one fun animal print, to fit every shape and taste. In sizes 34A-40D.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Comfort Devotion Bra, Full Coverage Underwire Bra, Cushionwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0BQYY4ZCG / Price: $17.47 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Crafted from luxe suede-like fabric, this full coverage bra from Maidenform® feels incredibly soft and comfortable against your skin. Designed with cushioned underwire cups for extra shape and lift without the pinch and dig, this women’s bra is ideal for everyday wear. Convertible straps can be worn straight or crisscross, giving you even more versatile options. Finished with back and side smoothing for a sleek look beneath your clothes, this Maidenform women’s bra offers back hook-and-eye closure for easy styling.']
I need ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Women", "Clothing", "Lingerie"] category products.
What specific sizes or size ranges do you usually wear in bras to ensure the perfect fit for your body type and needs?
I usually wear bra sizes within the range of 34C to 36D to ensure the perfect fit for my body type and needs. The right size is crucial for me to achieve both comfort and support in a bra.
